entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lucky Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.1°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
